massim.javaagents.agents

Class MarsUtil

  • java.lang.Object
    • massim.javaagents.agents.MarsUtil

  • public class MarsUtil
extends Object
    This is a utility-class for the Mars-scenario. It us useful for creating actions and dealing with percepts.
    Author:
    tristanbehrens
